title.rendered: Free Gift + Columbus Walls of Books!

content.rendered:
FREE GIFT with Any $25 Purchase of Melissa & Doug®

Jump into summer with fun games and toys from Melissa & Doug®! From now through 05/31, get a FREE “On the Go” activity pad (valued at $5.00) with ANY $25 purchase of Melissa & Doug® toys and educational products.

 

New Walls of Books in Columbus, GA

There will be a NEW Walls of Books opening in Columbus, GA in early June. It will be a large store with plenty of options. The store has a big retail footprint plus a dedicated space for events/meetings. The owner intends to be community-focused, hosting numerous events throughout the year. Stay tuned for more details!

 

Franchise Training

The Walls of Books Columbus owner and managers are at our new headquarters this week for franchise training. They are learning all the ins and outs about how to start and run their bookstore. Everything has gone very well so far… the Columbus store promises to be a fantastic place to shop!

excerpt.rendered: From now through 05/31, get a FREE “On the Go” activity pad (valued at $5.00) with ANY $25 purchase of Melissa & Doug® toys and educational products.
